page-index-hero-image-alt: Ihe atụ nke obodo ọdịnihu, na-anọchite anya gburugburu ebe obibi Ethereum.
page-index-meta-description: Ethereum bu ụzọ zuru ụwa nile, nke akwadopụtàrà maka ego na ụdịrị ngwa kòmpụtà ọhụrụ. Na Ethereum, ị nwere ike ide koodù na-achịkwa ego, ma ruo ngwa kòmpụtà ndị enwere ike inweta ebe ọ bụla n’ ụwa.
page-index-description: Ethereum bụ teknụzụ obodo na-eme ka cryptocurrency na-arụ ọrụ, ether (ETH) na ọtụtụ puku ngwa enweghị nchikota.
page-index-get-started-description: ethereum.org bụ ọnụ ụzọ gị n'ime ụwa Ethereum. Teknụzụ dị ọhụrụ na-agbanwe agbanwe - ọ na-enyere aka inwe onye ndu. Nke a bụ ihe anyị na-akwado ka ị mee ma ọ bụrụ na ịchọrọ imikpu n'ime.
page-index-get-started-image-alt: Ihe ngosi nke onye na-arụ ọrụ na kọmputa.
page-index-get-started-wallet-descriptio: Obere akpa ego na-enye gị ohere ijikọ na Ethereum wee jikwaa ego gị.
page-index-get-started-wallet-image-alt: Ihe atụ nke ngwa roboti nwere oghere dika ahụ, na-anọchite anya obere akpa ego Ethereum.
page-index-get-started-eth-description: ETH bụ ego nke Ethereum - ị nwere ike iji ya na ngwa ọrụ.
page-index-get-started-eth-image-alt: Ihe atụ nke otu ndị mmadụ na-enwe ojuju anya na ether (ETH) glyph na egwu.
page-index-get-started-dapps-description: Dapps bụ ngwa ọrụ nke Ethereum kwadoro. Hụ ihe ị ga-eme.
page-index-get-started-devs-description: Ọ bụrụ na ịchọrọ ịmalite ide koodu na Ethereum, anyị nwere akwụkwọ, nkuzi na ndị ọzọ na ọwa onye nrụpụta anyị.
page-index-get-started-devs-image-alt: Ihe atụ nke aka na-emepụta akara ETH nke e ji brik lego mee.
page-index-what-is-ethereum-description: Ethereum bụ teknụzụ nke n'ekpuchi ego dijitalụ, ịkwụ ụgwọ zuru ụwa ọnụ na ngwa ọrụ. Ndị obodo a ewulitela akụ na ụba dijitalụ na-eto eto, ụzọ ọhụrụ nwere obi ike maka ndị okike iji nweta ego n'ịntanetị, yana ọtụtụ ihe ndị ọzọ. Ọ mepere emepe maka onye ọ bụla, ebe ọ bụla ịnọ n'ụwa - naanị ihe ị chọrọ bụ ịntanetị.
page-index-what-is-ethereum-secondary-bu: Ihe ndị ọzọ na ego dijitalụ
page-index-what-is-ethereum-image-alt: Ihe ngosi nke onye na ele anya n'ahịa, pụtara nnọchi anya Ethereum.
page-index-defi-description: Taa, ọtụtụ ijeri mmadụ enweghị ike imepe akaụntụ ụlọakụ, ndị ọzọ ka egbochiri ịkwụ ụgwọ ha. Usoro ego ego nke Ethereum (DeFi) adịghị ehi ụra ma ọ bụ ịkpa ókè. Naanị ijikọ ịntanetị, ị nwere ike izipu, nata, gbaziri, kpata ọmụrụ nwa, nakwa kwanye ego n'ebe ọ bụla n'ụwa.
page-index-defi-image-alt: Ihe atụ nke aka na-enye akara ETH.
page-index-internet-description: Taa, anyị na-enweta ọrụ ịntanetị 'n'efu' site n'ịhapụ njikwa ozi nkeonwe anyị. Emeghere ọrụ Ethereum na ndabara - naanị ihe ị chọrọ bu obere akpa ego. Ndị a bụ n'efu ma dịkwa mfe ịtọlite, nke ị ga-achịkwa ma jiri rụọ ọrụ na-enweghị ozi nkeonwe.
page-index-internet-secondary-button: Ndị ọzọ na obere akpa ego
page-index-internet-image-alt: Ihe ngosi nke kọmpụta arụrụ n'ọdịniihu, nke kristal Ethereum na akwado.
page-index-developers-description: Ethereum na ngwa ọrụ ya doro anya na buru nke mepere emepe. Ị nwere ike iji koodu nrụpụta ya nakwa jiri ọrụ ndị ọzọ rụrụla. Ọ bụrụ na ịchọghị ịmụ asụsụ ọhụrụ ị nwere ike ịmekọrịta naanị na koodu mepere emepe site na iji Javascript na asụsụ ndị ọzọ dị adị.
page-index-developers-code-example-descr: Ị nwere ike wulite ụlọ akụ site na mgbagha ị dere.
Ị nwere ike ịmepụta tokin ị nwere ike ịnyefe ma jiri n'ofe ngwa ọrụ.
page-index-developers-code-example-title: Otu obere akpa ego JavaScript Ethereum
page-index-developers-code-example-descr: Ị nwere ike iji asụsụ ndị dị adị ka gị na Ethereum na ngwa ọrụ ndị ọzọ na-emekọrịta.
page-index-developers-code-example-title: DNS mepere emepe na anaghị eji ikike
page-index-developers-code-example-descr: Ị nwere ike chegharịa ọrụ ndị dị ugbu a dị ka nk e n'enweghi nchịkwa, ngwa ọrụ mepere emepe.
page-index-network-stats-eth-price-expla: Ọnụahịa kacha ọhụrụ maka 1 ether. Ị nwere ike ịzụta opeka mpe 0.000000000000000001 – ịkwesighi ịzụtacha 1 ETH dum.
page-index-network-stats-tx-day-explaine: Ọnụọgụ azụmahịa gara nke ọma na netwọk n'ime awa 24 gara aga.
page-index-network-stats-value-defi-expl: Ọnụ ego a na-enweta na ngwa ego (DeFi) n'enweghi nchikwa, akụ na ụba dijitalụ Ethereum.
page-index-network-stats-nodes-explainer: Ọtụtụ puku ndị ọrụ efu na-arụ ọrụ Ethereum gburugburu ụwa, nke a maara dị ka nodu.
page-index-contribution-banner-descripti: Weebụsaịtị a bụ ebe mepere emepe nwere narị ndị enyemaka obodo. Ị nwere ike ịtụpụta atụmatụ ndozi na ọdịnaya ọ bụla dị na saịtị a, tụọ atụmatụ ọhụrụ dị egwu, ma ọ bụ nyere anyị aka ịkpọchapụ njehie.
page-index-contribution-banner-image-alt: Akara Ethereum ejiri brik lego mee.
page-index-contribution-banner-button: Ihe ndị ọzọ na inye aka
page-index-tout-upgrades-description: Ethereum 2.0 bụ mmemme nke nkwalite ejikọrọ ọnụ emebere iji mee ka Ethereum dịkwuo elu, nchekwa, na nke ga-adigide.
page-index-tout-upgrades-image-alt: Ihe ngosi nke ụgbọ mmiri na-anọchi anya ike abawanyela nke Eth2.
page-index-tout-enterprise-description: Hụ otu Ethereum nwere ike isi mepee ụdị azụmaahịa ọhụụ, belata ọnụahịa gị yana gosipụta azụmaahịa gị n'ọdịnihu.
page-index-tout-enterprise-image-alt: Ihe ngosi nke kọmpụta/ngwaọrụ ga-eme n'ọdịnihu.
page-index-tout-community-description: Ethereum bụ ihe niile gbasara obodo. Ọ bụ ndị si na nzụlite na mmasị dị iche iche mejupụtara ya. Hụ ka ị ga-esi sonye.
page-index-tout-community-image-alt: Ihe ngosi nke otu ndị na-ewu ụlọ na-arụkọ ọrụ ọnụ.
page-index-nft-description: Ethereum abụghị naanị maka ego dijitalụ. Ihe ọ bụla ị nwere nwere ike inwe nnọchite anya, zụọ n'ahịa ma tinye ya ka ọ bụrụ tokin na-abụghị fungible (NFT). Ị nwere ike ime ka nka gị buru tokin wee nweta ụgwọ ọrụ na-akpaghị aka mgbe ọ bụla erere ya ọzọ. Ma ọ bụ jiri tokin ma ọ bụ ihe ị nwere iji were mbinye ego. Ohere na-eto eto mgbe niile.
page-index-nft-alt: A na-egosipụta akara Eth site na hologram.
